name: Path of Esthesia
description:
Path of Esthesia is a survival game that takes place in a surprisingly ordinary environment.

STORY

You play as a young sensory hypersensitive woman that must cope with the daily hassles of her condition.

Help her make it through the city, identify what is depleting her energy, and find the way that leaves her in peace.

CONTROLS

This game requires a gamepad controller to be played.
